typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('covid_tracking'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		date as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		fips as string,
		cases as string,
		deaths as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'lineage') ~> sourceCSV
ModifyHeadingStyle select(mapColumn(
		Load_date,
		Load_time,
		Record_Date = Date,
		County,
		State,
		Fips,
		Cases,
		Deaths,
		Iso_country,
		Death_rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropLineageColumn
sourceCSV derive(Load_time = substring(toString(currentTimestamp()), 12,25),
		Load_date = currentDate(),
		Iso_country = 'USA',
		Death_rate = concat(toString(round(multiply(divide(toFloat(deaths),toFloat(cases)),100),4)),'%')) ~> AddNewColumns
AddNewColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			initCap($$) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ModifyHeadingStyle
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
DropLineageColumn sink(partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
